reviews.text:
This café encapsulates the spirit of Holosiivsky district in itself: beautiful parks, lively student live, spectacular sunsets and dreamy Vasilkivska street atmosphere with "nowhere-to-find-a-bloody-toilet" vibes!
P.s You can find one in KFS, though. Pretty decent for the local standards.

I go to this coffee shop not only for coffee, but also for a good mood for the whole day. The drinks here are delicious, the baristas are very cheerful and friendly. I usually don't write reviews, but this establishment is special for me - I am always welcomed here like at home. I like to be here alone and with friends, drink coffee and enjoy quiet music and a pleasant atmosphere.
Very polite and friendly staff, the atmosphere of the coffee shop is cozy, the coffee is delicious, I will come more often) The only minus is that there is no trash can, nowhere to throw garbage.

I am writing this review in a cold sweat and in a terrible state

I ordered Flat White, noted that I need it on any vegetable milk, and this is very important (I am allergic to whey protein, casein and lactose intolerance)

After me, my husband ordered a flat white with regular milk.

My flat on the herbal one was brought out when it was ready and the man quickly took it, I told the staff that they had given my coffee to another person.

They apologized and indicated that they would make me coffee now. I saw that one of the baristas was already in the process of preparing a flat white with ordinary milk, for that man, so I again noted that I need vegetable milk, and this is important, for which I received confirmation.

I received the coffee, I felt that there was no almond aftertaste (it is not always distinct), so I apologized. They confirmed to me again that the milk there is almond. I believed and drank coffee.

After that, already on the way home, I started having a typical reaction to the consumption of dairy products. Urticaria, swelling, difficulty breathing, dry mouth, tachycardia and panic attack. After the condition was stabilized with medication, terrible diarrhea began and I began to swell and lose fluids.

Now it is necessary to rehydrate the body intravenously. I had other plans.

UNDERSTAND! When a person asks a lot for vegetable milk, it does not mean that it is his whim (but even if you have whims, you provide such a service and must fulfill it), and it can be a direct LIFE-THREATEN for people with total intolerance and allergy to dairy products.

I will not come to this institution again. I can't say anything good about the employees. The fact that the institution has a rating lower than 3 is completely justified

Tasteless coffee in this establishment is not a reason for me to write angry reviews.

But careless attitude to human health and life is an excuse. Below you can read what happened to my husband after visiting the institution, and try to understand where the practice of using vegetable milk in institutions to replace cow's milk came from, and why, when a person insists on the importance of using vegetable milk, it is not a whim.
It is very good that we faced this situation knowingly, and knew how to provide my husband with emergency medical care and avoid dangerous complications (and he is prone to them: anaphylactic shock, Quincke's edema - these are life-threatening reactions).

I just want to influence the management of the establishment to provide an accessible explanation to the employees about what can happen to a person who reported the presence of an allergy to cow's milk, but who does not care, fraudulently include it in a meal/drink, considering that the deception will not be revealed
